desc: Mindful creating with paint. Learning new skills and exploring new methods with friends who are positive creatives. Supporting positive mindset, risk taking, and promoting a safe space to relax and recharge. Makers share their ideas, projects, and questions. Social interaction is encouraged and a primary goal.

layout.text: Sparkle and Shine with Lisbeth Subscription

Sparkle and Shine is a subscription group comprised of creatives that love to make and create! They are positive, supportive , and offer a safe space to encourage others to take risks. Sparkies like to make their art sparkle, but they like to sparkle from the inside radiating a positive outlook. Join this special group and look forward to Mondays! We get together, paint, laught, create, and have fun!
